thread.title: The Weeknd hits pre-Grammy do with Selena Gomez lookalike | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: The Weeknd hits pre-Grammy do with Selena Gomez lookalike | Daily Mail Online

author: Bobbie Whiteman For Dailymail.Com
title: The Weeknd hits pre-Grammy do with Selena Gomez lookalike | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share Selena and The Weeknd, whose real name is Abel Tesfaye, were first spotted kissing January 10 at Italian eatery Giorgio Baldi, confirming their long rumoured relationship. The Weeknd, a two time Grammy winner, is nominated in Sunday's awards for his work on Beyoncé's Lemonade. Plus one: The Canadian singer-songwriter, actor and record producer took along his co-manager Tony Sal's 31-year-old wife Rima, who was Miss USA in 2010 Mixing and mingling: The 26-year-old, whose real name is Abel Tesfaye, was soon surrounded by a crowd at the party He will also be performing with Daft Punk at the ceremony, which CBS will broadcast live from Staples Center in downtown Los Angeles. Selena was not nominated so it remains to be seen whether she will be there for her man. If she's not, their incredibly busy schedules may stop them meeting up in the coming weeks. Face in the crowd: Rima had trouble keeping up with the in-demand star who is set to perform with Daft Punk at the Grammys, broadcast live from Staples Center in Los Angeles on Sunday Hanging with his homies: The Weeknd posed with DJ Khaled at the star-studded party The Weeknd kicks off his 46-date Starboy: Legend Of The Fall Tour on February 17 at Sweden's Ericsson Globe in Stockholm. Meanwhile, Selena is playing young mother Lisa in James Franco's In Dubious Battle, due to hit VOD on February 17. The talented star also executive produced Netflix series 13 Reasons Why, which will be available to binge view on March 31, and she will no doubt be in demand to help promote the series. Quite a likeness: The real Selena Gomez in New York on Monday Make in monochrome like Selena in Proenza Schouler
